data.title: The Soothsayer by Von Heidenstam, Verner: Good + overall Hardcover (1919) First edition.
data.meta_description: First edition. - Hardcover - The Four Seas Company, Boston - 1919 - Condition: Good + overall - Translated from the Swedish by Karoline M. Knudsen. Carl Gustaf Verner von Heidenstam [1859 - 1940] was a Swedish poet, novelist and laureate of the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1916. Small 8vo, 48pp, orange cover with medallion printed in black on cover 'Thou Canst Not Serve Two Gods'. Cover dusty with some pencil marks, spine sunned, bumped on both edges, internally clean, front cover loose but secure. Good+. - The Soothsayer
data.text:
The Soothsayer (Classic Reprint)

Verner von Heidenstam

Published by Forgotten Books, 2018

ISBN 10: 1332069231 / ISBN 13: 9781332069231

New / Paperback

Quantity: Over 20 available

Print on Demand

Paperback. Condition: New. Print on Demand. Excerpt from The Soothsayer. About the Publisher, Forgotten Books publishes hundreds of thousands of rare and classic books. This book is a reproduction of an important historical work. Forgotten Books uses state-of-the-art technology to digitally reconstruct the work, preserving the original format whilst repairing imperfections present in the aged copy. In rare cases, an imperfection in the original, such as a blemish or missing page, may be replicated in our edition. We do, however, repair the vast majority of imperfections successfully; any imperfections that remain are intentionally left to preserve the state of such historical works. This text has been digitally restored from a historical edition. Some errors may persist, however we consider it worth publishing due to the work's historical value. The digital edition of all books may be viewed on our website before purchase. print-on-demand item. Seller Inventory # 9781332069231_0

Contact seller

The Soothsayer (First edition)

Verner Von Heidenstam

Published by The Four Seas Company, 1919

Used / Hardcover First Edition

Quantity: 1 available

Seller: BookManBookWoman Books, Nashville, TN, U.S.A.

Seller Rating:

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. WOW! Rare find. 48 pages. Clean and tight, this is an ex library copy with usual marks and card pocket. Blind stamp of Dayton library on several pages and 'no longer property of' stamps. 2 colored dots on spine, bar code on rear. Wear to spine and corners- good tight copy.Shelf 588 No previous owner name, not a remainder. PHOTOS POSTED WITH OUR BOOKS ARE STOCK AND DO NOT NECESSARILY REFLECT CONDITION OR EDITION OF BOOK OFFERED FOR SALE. WE DO NOT POST THE PHOTOS. Seller Inventory # 323002

Contact seller

The soothsayer, by Verner von Heidenstam. Authorized translation from the Swedish by Karoline M. Knudsen (1919) [Leatherbound]

Heidenstam, Verner von

New / Hardcover

Quantity: 18 available

Print on Demand

Leatherbound. Condition: NEW. Leatherbound edition. Condition: New. Leather Binding on Spine and Corners with Golden leaf printing on spine. Bound in genuine leather with Satin ribbon page markers and Spine with raised gilt bands. A perfect gift for your loved ones. Reprinted from 1919 edition. NO changes have been made to the original text. This is NOT a retyped or an ocr'd reprint. Illustrations, Index, if any, are included in black and white. Each page is checked manually before printing. As this print on demand book is reprinted from a very old book, there could be some missing or flawed pages, but we always try to make the book as complete as possible. Fold-outs, if any, are not part of the book. If the original book was published in multiple volumes then this reprint is of only one volume, not the whole set. IF YOU WISH TO ORDER PARTICULAR VOLUME OR ALL THE VOLUMES YOU CAN CONTACT US. Resized as per current standards. Sewing binding for longer life, where the book block is actually sewn (smythe sewn/section sewn) with thread before binding which results in a more durable type of binding. Pages: 56 Language: English Pages: 56. Seller Inventory # LB100152046209

Contact seller

The Soothsayer: A Play in One Act

Heidenstam, Verner von (translated by Karoline Knudsen)

Published by The Four Seas Company, Boston, MA, 1919

Used / Hardcover First Edition

Quantity: 1 available

Seller: Aladdin Books, Fullerton, CA, U.S.A.

Seller Rating:

Hardcover. Condition: Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Good. First American Edition. Book was exposed to some moisture damage causing some rippling of the cloth and a small stain on bottom of front board. NO internal water damage. No markings or bookplates. Dust jacket is quite fragile and has some staining evident in lower right corner of front panel. Shallow, tiny chipping to and near spine ends and a long tear at top end of jacket along spine. A price sticker was affixed to rear jacket flap but has been partly removed. Still, a decent example of a book which is scarce in the first place and probably rare in the original dust jacket. Seller Inventory # 103921
